identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a High-Signal, Autonomous RAG Dashboard

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap');

rules: NEVER use gradients for text legibility.
Primary brand color is for ACTIONS only.

layout.grid_system: CSS Grid with min-max widths. Mobile: Stacked.

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all duration-200 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900 transition-all duration-200 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-3 py-1.5 transition-colors

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-blue-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

chat_bubbles.user: bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-3 max-w-[80%]
chat_bubbles.agent: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-4 py-3 max-w-[80%] shadow-sm

memory_feed.item: p-3 mb-3 bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md hover:border-blue-200 transition-all cursor-default text-sm

icons.usage: Use Lucide icons for all UI elements. Examples: FileText for docs, Brain for memory, Sparkles for AI, UploadCloud for dropzone.

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
Use focus-visible rings for keyboard navigation.
All interactive elements MUST have aria-label if no text.
Use semantic HTML (main, aside, section, article).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. OVERRIDE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the colors and fonts defined above.
3. COMPONENT STRATEGY: Use shadcn components as a base but HEAVILY customize them using the classes defined in 'components' section. Do not use default shadcn styles.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 3-column layout. Left Sidebar (Knowledge), Center (Chat), Right Sidebar (Memory).
5. STATE VISIBILITY: Every async action (upload, processing, thinking) must have a visual indicator (spinner, pulse, progress bar).
6. MEMORY FEED: This should feel 'alive'. Use a scrollable area with new items appearing at the top with a subtle fade-in animation.
7. NO TRANSPARENT BACKGROUNDS on headers: Use bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' (generic centered layouts). Use asymmetry and density.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
NEVER center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
